articles.title: Children face a greater risk of catching coronavirus because of how cough droplets fall - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers in Singapore measured the way Covid-19 travels after its expelled by an infected person keeping two metres away from others. They recommend short people keep greater distance.
articles.content:
Short people may face a greater risk of catching coronavirus because of how droplets fall to the ground, a study has claimed.

articles.title: WHO looks at mink farm biosecurity globally after Danish coronavirus cases - Reuters
articles.description: The World Health Organization is looking at biosecurity around mink farms in countries across the world to prevent further "spillover events" after Denmark ordered a national mink cull because of an outbreak of coronavirus infections in the animals.
